name: tm93
effect: Teaches wild charge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Wild Charge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
